pageContext.course_type_long_description: Prepare for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build mechanical and structural projects such as Gear Cars, Gondolas, Merry-Go-Rounds, and Scissor Lifts. Then learn about concepts such as basic programming skills, sensors, and robotic components while building robots with the WeDo system! Engineering and Robotics come together in this new full-day camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Robotics using LEGO® WeDo: FULL DAY
